mapper.select: select d.id, d.status, d.create_user_id, c.icon, date_format(d.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time, d.modify_user_id, date_format(d.modify_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') modify_time ,d.member_id, c.id clock_id, c.title clock_title, d.new_status, u.account, u.pic_path, u.id user_id from t_clock_deal d inner join t_user u on u.status = 1 inner join t_clock c on c.id = d.clock_id and c.create_user_id = u.id and c.`status` = 1 where d.status = 11 and d.member_id = #{userId} limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
